subject: Tennis
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer lost to a low-ranked opponent for the third straight tournament, his new and larger racket failing him in a defeat to Daniel Brands in the second round in Gstaad.
snippet: Roger Federer lost to a low-ranked opponent for the third straight tournament, his new and larger racket failing him in a defeat to Daniel Brands in the second round in Gstaad.
